name: Under the stars (itch)
description:
A sailor lost at sea tries to find the way home. The constellations show him the way and tell a story. 

Play the game with the mouse.
Click a star with the left mousebutton and drag to another star and release the mouse button to make a connection between the two stars.
Find all the constellations hidden in the sky.
Exit the game with the Escape key.

Made during the Global Game Jam 2021 in collaboration with other jammers.
